findings.title: Malicious Kyber Admin deploying a fake token
findings.description: A malicious Kyber Admin can deploy a fake token, which could lead to user funds being at risk if there is no appropriate front-end solution for users to confirm they have the correct token address.

findings.title: Lack of registry of tokens in Ethereum ecosystem
findings.description: The Ethereum ecosystem lacks a registry of tokens, which can lead to users inputting incorrect token addresses and putting their funds at risk.

findings.title: Improper privilege level for parameters in KyberNetwork::setParams() function
findings.description: The setParams() function in KyberNetwork contract has improper privilege levels assigned to its parameters.
